name: 王鴻祥
objective: 本課程介紹最新理論、方法與工具的設計實務應用，以及使用者、科技與商業的跨領域整合，以提升學生在策略層次上的設計概念化和具體化能力。內容包括一套整合創新設計理論方法、美學、人因、工程與永續的研發路數。學生將於智慧產品設計案中演練跨領域應用研究所需的知識技能。
schedule:
01. Introduction and grouping
02. What are smart products?
03. Technologies enabling smart products
04. How do industrial designers think of smart products?
05. How can industrial designers contribute to smart product R&D?
06~08. Workshop I- UCD, P2U interaction, UX
09. Presentation
10. Opportunities in information flow, UI, emotional value, better life,
11~15. Workshop II- Search for opportunities in information flow, UI, emotional value, better life, and conceptualize a smart product 
17. Presentation
18. Summit final report.
scorePolicy:
50% Workshops (processes & products) and class participation
20% Midterm and final presentation
30% Final report
